SEARCH

Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ConnectionSceneController
    Class ConnectionSceneController represents the controller of the connection scene, the scene where the player can choose the connection type and insert their username and the server address
    EndGameSceneController
    Controller of the end game scene that shows the final ranking
    GameSceneController
    Class for the graphical interface of the game
    Gui
    Class Gui represents the Graphical User Interface
    GuiManager
    Class GuiManager represents the manager of the GUI
    JoinGameSceneController
    Class JoinGameSceneController represents the controller of the join game scene, the scene where the player can see the list of existing games they can join
    LobbySceneController
    Class LobbySceneController represents the controller of the lobby scene, the scene where the player waits for the game to start
    MenuSceneController
    Class MenuSceneController represents the controller of the menu scene, the first scene of the game
    NumberPlayersController
    Class NumberPlayersController represents the controller of the scene where the player can choose the number of players of the game
    StartGameSceneController
    Class StartGameSceneController represents the controller of the scene where the player can choose to create a new game or to join an existing one
    TableRowEndScene
    This class represents a row of the table of EndGameSceneController
